citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 pm on
21-MAY-19.
Inspector honked horn, knocked on house, called and waited in the driveway for 30 minutes.
